title: Watcher
description: Rear Window meets The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo. Teri is a watcher. Robbed of her strength and mobility, she has become a silent witness to the lives of others.When she stumbles across a crime so vicious that it forces her to choose between herself and a woman she's never met, Teri has to untangle a web of corruption in an insulated mountain town before she's the next to disappear.
author: Jason Stokes
